pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Multinomial Distribution Approximation and Imputation for Incomplete Data // Fit incomplete multinomial data by mixture multinomial distribution approximation (Dunson and Xing (2009) DOI:10.1198/jasa.2009.tm08439). Estimate latent joint distribution by slice Gibbs sampler (Walker (2007) DOI:10.1080/03610910601096262). Perform efficient missing data imputation and other statistical inference based on joint distribution estimation.
